DOC.brief_summary: The hypothesis of this study is that Korean subjects have similar Pharmacokinetics (PK) characteristics to those seen in other populations.
DOC.criteria: healthy male subjects, 1855 years old Body Mass Index (BMI) of 17.5 to 30.5 kg/m2 provide informed consent blood pressure >140/90 mm Hg any condition possibly affecting drug absorption positive urine drug screen
